item.title: Network TUI
item.description: At the end of my previous blog post I mentioned about wanting to work on Textual, and I’m excited to share here my first project using Textual. I feel like for us network engineers, working on a CLI makes our work more enjoyable so naturally, building a TUI(Terminal User Interface) to do some of the automation tasks was a no-brainer to me. I have called it Net-TUI, a TUI application to do few network automation tasks.
